name: Make Way (WhumpbackHale)
description:
Made for a personal 48 hour game jam. The theme was "Replay".

WASD to move. Space will switch your character away from the Guardian to the Wanderer. The goal is to get the Wanderer to the stairs. It doesn't matter what happens to the Guardian. He can take hits from bullets and moving enemies.  Press the "R" button to restart the level if you get stuck.

Press "M" to mute the music. Or you can use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the volume as needed.

Have fun!
